CustomField.description:
Total count of all related closed won opportunities this year . This count is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Sum_of_Closed_Won_This_Year__c
Criteria for closed won this year is stage = closed won and close date is this year.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sum of annual opportunity revenue of all won opportunities this calendar year.
CustomField.label: Sum of Closed/Won This Year
